item.title: ğŸ¥¼ The new probes fill a niche, where up until now, researchers studying large animals used large, invasive probes to record neural activity from dozens of neurons. Neuropixels 1.0-NHP are much smaller & less invasive, and can record from hundreds of neurons simultaneously. (5/8)
